==== Notes ====

On Jaunty wireless card did not work out of the box, linux-backports-modules* required. By the way on some networks wireless speed and signal strenght could be not as good as expected, downloading and compiling newest drivers (<nowiki>[[http://www.orbit-lab.org/kernel/compat-wireless-2.6/2009/10/compat-wireless-2009-10-28.tar.bz2|2009, october 28]]</nowiki>) from <nowiki>[[http://linuxwireless.org/|linuxwireless.org]]</nowiki> definitely improves performances.
